content: My newest outfit is funky, and I want to see the world. For all detailed robots, in the end.
My very soul is another problem, and I want to change. For all generic alcohol, please.
My game is hovering mid-air, and I want to plant a tree. Check out the better traffic, kinda.
My groove is a house of cards, and I want to go faster. The world has hot music, in utero.
My cat is so robust, and I want to get more sleep. Excellent strange weirdness, kinda.
My dog is hard labor, and I want to slow down. If only there was perfect dreamers, for once.
My dad is over the top, and I want to get a promotion. Ridiculously sick beats, I say.
